long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curately supercharges recruitment teams with the power of data and automation, making talent engagement, pipeline building, and scalable hiring a breeze.

Curately’s Chrome extension lets recruiters:

- Snag talent profiles from LinkedIn with a click
- View all talent interactions in one streamlined dashboard
- Unearth any email address
- Sync candidate info directly to your ATS
- Send automated sequences and follow-up messages like a pro

Curately merges data and context from all the tools recruiters love—email, ATS, LinkedIn, and more—creating the ultimate hub for talent relationships. With deep insights into the entire recruiting process, automation for mass outreach, and top-notch collaboration tools, TA teams can plan ahead with confidence and flair.
